Thus, the Fortran code would be something like:

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, count = 0

   do
      read *, n

      count = count +1

      if (n ==0) exit

   end do

   print *, count

end program

program main

implicit none

integer :: n, count

count =0

do

   read(*,*, end=999) n   ! if end, jump to 999

   count=count +1

   if (n ==0) exit

end do

print *, count

stop

999 continue
